Translations.Text: est hoc magic vos non vide
Suffer burning Vos est patient impatient it est the same pro vos! Hoc est just requital quod vos perfecit
They enjoy quod their Dominus reserved them; their Dominus spared them retribution Hell
Eat drink happily in return tuus works
They relax luxurious furnishings nos match them beautiful conjux
Pro those believed their infans alias subsequentis them belief nos habet their infans ligatus them! Nos nunquam fail reward them any work Omnis person est paid pro quod he perfecit
Nos supply them fruits meats they love
They enjoy drinks nunquam polluted nunquam sinful drink
Serving them est servus protected pearls
They meet each alius reminisce themselves
They dictus Nos used est generis humilis noster people
DEUS BEATUS NOS spared NOS agony DE MALE winds
Nos used implore Eum; He est the Multus Generis Merciful
Vos remind people Cum tuus Dominus beatus vos vos est nec soothsayer nor crazy
They dictus He est poet; just wait dum he est denatus
Dictus Iit on waiting ego wait vos
